pages.text: Pholiderpeton is an embolomere amphibian from the late Carboniferous period. P. scutigerum grew up to 2 meters in length with some species grow even larger than that. They were carnivorous and would have hunted the estuarine fish.
$(l)Eats:$() Raw/Cooked Fish$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Raw Fish$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Spawn like Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Egg Collection Phial
